pr_title: HDDS-3513. Add OzoneConfiguration to UGI when startup S3Gateway

timeline.message: HDDS-3513. add conf to UGI when security is enable

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we need to hard-code "hadoop.http.authentication.type"="simple", but this is a separate issue that we can fix in a different JIRA.
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: That's correct, I will open another JIRA to remove this hard-code configuration.
replies.author: simonsssu

timeline.message: HDDS-3513. Remove security check for set ozoneconfiguration to UGI
